pullSecrets.description:
#
# Optionally specify an array of imagePullSecrets.
# Secrets must be manually created in the namespace.
# ref: https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/configure-pod-container/pull-image-private-registry/
# e.g:
# pullSecrets:
#   - myRegistryKeySecretName
pullSecrets.title: pullSecrets

initContainers.description:
#
# ref: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/workloads/pods/init-containers/
# e.g:
# initContainers:
#  - name: your-image-name
#    image: your-image
#    imagePullPolicy: Always
#    command: ['sh', '-c', 'echo "hello world"']
initContainers.title: initContainers

livenessProbe.description:
# Configure extra options for RabbitMQ Cluster Operator containers' liveness and readiness probes
# ref: https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/configure-pod-container/configure-liveness-readiness-probes/#configure-probes
livenessProbe.title: livenessProbe

nodePorts.description:
# Node ports to expose
#
# NOTE: choose port between <30000-32767>
nodePorts.title: nodePorts

sessionAffinity.description:
#
# If "ClientIP", consecutive client requests will be directed to the same Pod
# ref: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/services-networking/service/#virtual-ips-and-service-proxies
sessionAffinity.title: sessionAffinity

path.description:
#
# Could be /metrics for aggregated metrics or /metrics/per-object for more details
path.title: path

allowExternal.description:
#
# The Policy model to apply. When set to false, only pods with the correct
# injector label will have network access to the ports injector is listening
# on. When true, injector will accept connections from any source
# (with the correct destination port).
allowExternal.title: allowExternal

extraEgress.description:
#
# e.g:
# extraEgress:
#   - ports:
#       - port: 1234
#     to:
#       - podSelector:
#           - matchLabels:
#               - role: frontend
#       - podSelector:
#           - matchExpressions:
#               - key: role
#                 operator: In
#                 values:
#                   - frontend
extraEgress.title: extraEgress

extraIngress.description:
#
# e.g:
# extraIngress:
#   - ports:
#       - port: 1234
#     from:
#       - podSelector:
#           - matchLabels:
#               - role: frontend
#       - podSelector:
#           - matchExpressions:
#               - key: role
#                 operator: In
#                 values:
#                   - frontend
extraIngress.title: extraIngress

customRules.description:
#
# ref: https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/access-authn-authz/rbac/#role-and-clusterrole
# e.g:
# customRules:
#   - apiGroups: A list of API groups (e.g., [""], ["apps"]).
#   - resources: A list of resource names (e.g., ["configmaps", "pods"]).
#   - verbs: A list of allowed access verbs (e.g., ["create", "get", "list"]).
customRules.title: customRules

extraRules.description:
#
# ref: https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/access-authn-authz/rbac/#role-and-clusterrole
# e.g:
# extraRules:
#   - apiGroups: A list of API groups (e.g., [""], ["apps"]).
#   - resources: A list of resource names (e.g., ["configmaps", "pods"]).
#   - verbs: A list of allowed access verbs (e.g., ["create", "get", "list"]).
extraRules.title: extraRules

resources.description:
# RabbitMQ Cluster Operator resource requests and limits
# Example:
# resources:
#   requests:
#     cpu: 2
#     memory: 512Mi
#   limits:
#     cpu: 3
#     memory: 1024Mi
resources.title: resources

name.description:
#
# If not set and create is true, a name is generated using the cloudpirates.fullname template
name.title: name

sidecars.description:
#
# e.g:
# sidecars:
#   - name: your-image-name
#     image: your-image
#     imagePullPolicy: Always
#     ports:
#       - name: portname
#         containerPort: 1234
sidecars.title: sidecars

topologySpreadConstraints.description:
#
# https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/workloads/pods/pod-topology-spread-constraints/
# The value is evaluated as a template
topologySpreadConstraints.title: topologySpreadConstraints

type.description:
# StrategyType
# Can be set to RollingUpdate or OnDelete
type.title: type

credentialUpdaterImage.description:
# RabbitMQ Default User Credential Updater Image
# ref: https://hub.docker.com/r/rabbitmqoperator/default-user-credential-updater/tags

pullSecrets.description:
#
# Optionally specify an array of imagePullSecrets.
# Secrets must be manually created in the namespace.
# ref: https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/configure-pod-container/pull-credentialUpdaterImage-private-registry/
# e.g:
# pullSecrets:
#   - myRegistryKeySecretName
pullSecrets.title: pullSecrets

credentialUpdaterImage.title: credentialUpdaterImage

diagnosticMode.description: # Enable diagnostic mode in the deployment(s)/statefulset(s)
diagnosticMode.title: diagnosticMode

global.description:
#
# Please, note that this will override the image parameters, including dependencies, configured to use the global value
global.title: global

image.description:
# RabbitMQ Messaging Topology Operator image
# ref: https://hub.docker.com/r/rabbitmqoperator/cluster-operator/tags

pullSecrets.description:

# Secrets must be manually created in the namespace.

# pullSecrets:
#   - myRegistryKeySecretName
#
pullSecrets.title: pullSecrets

initContainers.title: initContainers

livenessProbe.title: livenessProbe
